item.title: Soccors for gays
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:17, topic:360194”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=456630.msg3342909#msg3342909 date=1284553941]

WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL?[quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=456630.msg3342338#msg3342338 date=1284500960]

Soccor and futbol?

futbol is real term america made up soccor cause they fags
[/quote]WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL? I know what football is and what soccer is, but futbol?

idiot americans decided to try to change name to soccor but it only worked in america

No, we call the game soccer in America, no one that I know of calls it soccor, and futbol is the SPANISH word for it. I don’t think anyone speaking english in America calls it that.

And then of course there is American Football, which is an entirely different game from soccer.

I never really got into soccer, I do like watching all the fighting it causes everywhere though, people seem to care WAY, WAY too much.
[/quote]
The only reason that fighting occurs is because faggot players (namely the entire Italian side) decide to take a dive at every opportunity they get.
Out of all the games that are played widely, I’d have to say that soccer is home to the most cheaters.[/quote]rofl? old info is old. have you seen how every fucking countries players play now? Plus, one of the concepts of the game is to trick the referee to your advantage, which, sadly does include trying to get cheap shots in.

Read full topic

item.title: Soccors for gays
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:17, topic:360194”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=456630.msg3342909#msg3342909 date=1284553941]

WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL?[quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=456630.msg3342338#msg3342338 date=1284500960]

Soccor and futbol?

futbol is real term america made up soccor cause they fags
[/quote]WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL? I know what football is and what soccer is, but futbol?

idiot americans decided to try to change name to soccor but it only worked in america

No, we call the game soccer in America, no one that I know of calls it soccor, and futbol is the SPANISH word for it. I don’t think anyone speaking english in America calls it that.

And then of course there is American Football, which is an entirely different game from soccer.

I never really got into soccer, I do like watching all the fighting it causes everywhere though, people seem to care WAY, WAY too much.
[/quote]
The only reason that fighting occurs is because faggot players (namely the entire Italian side) decide to take a dive at every opportunity they get.
Out of all the games that are played widely, I’d have to say that soccer is home to the most cheaters.[/quote]

I like to watch shows like Most Shocking and such where they play videos, and it seems half of them are related to soccer. Whether it’s the fans rushing the field, tearing the stadium down, killing each other for no reason. Or all the times groups of soccer fans meet before the game to beat the shit out of each other and people get their teeth kicked into the curb, it makes pretty good TV, but it also makes soccer fans look like idiots.

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:16, topic:360194”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=456630.msg3342886#msg3342886 date=1284547134]

WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL?[quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=456630.msg3342338#msg3342338 date=1284500960]

Soccor and futbol?

futbol is real term america made up soccor cause they fags
[/quote]WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL? I know what football is and what soccer is, but futbol?

idiot americans decided to try to change name to soccor but it only worked in america
[/quote]

No, we call the game soccer in America, no one that I know of calls it soccor, and futbol is the SPANISH word for it. I don’t think anyone speaking english in America calls it that.

And then of course there is American Football, which is an entirely different game from soccer.

I never really got into soccer, I do like watching all the fighting it causes everywhere though, people seem to care WAY, WAY too much. :P[/quote]
The only reason that fighting occurs is because faggot players (namely the entire Italian side) decide to take a dive at every opportunity they get.
Out of all the games that are played widely, I’d have to say that soccer is home to the most cheaters.

item.title: Soccors for gays
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:14, topic:360194”][quote author=Teh Spede link=topic=456630.msg3342846#msg3342846 date=1284537790]
WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL?[quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=456630.msg3342338#msg3342338 date=1284500960]

Soccor and futbol?

futbol is real term america made up soccor cause they fags
[/quote]WHAT THE FUCK IS FUTBOL? I know what football is and what soccer is, but futbol?
[/quote]

idiot americans decided to try to change name to soccor but it only worked in america[/quote]

No, we call the game soccer in America, no one that I know of calls it soccor, and futbol is the SPANISH word for it. I don’t think anyone speaking english in America calls it that.

And then of course there is American Football, which is an entirely different game from soccer.

I never really got into soccer, I do like watching all the fighting it causes everywhere though, people seem to care WAY, WAY too much.

Read full topic
